scripts.db:nuke: docker compose down -v --remove-orphans && docker compose up -d --build
scripts.db:shell: docker compose exec db psql -U user -d app_db
scripts.api:migrate: docker compose exec api npm run migration:run
scripts.api:seed: docker compose exec api npm run seed
scripts.fresh: npm run db:nuke && echo 'Wachten op DB...' && sleep 5 && npm run api:migrate && npm run api:seed
